/usr/bin/c++    -fopenmp -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/DirectSearch_CMA.dir/Algorithms/DirectSearch/CMA.cpp.o  -o ../bin/DirectSearch_CMA -rdynamic ../lib/libshark.a -lboost_unit_test_framework -lboost_serialization -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -llapack /usr/lib/libblas/libblas.so /usr/lib/atlas-base/libatlas.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/libblas:/usr/lib/atlas-base
